website_summaries.verdict: Stands out for its elegant design, although some found it to be too small to easily accommodate some tea bags.
pros: Hinged lid is acrylic, so you can easily see the type and number of bags
Can hold up to 80 tea bags
cons: Many felt that this option is a little too small, and that the compartments will not easily fit all teabag sizes well
Reports of the acrylic top arriving  broken, damaged

customer_reviews.title: Just right
customer_reviews.text: This is just what I needed. An easy-to-use container, that is see-through, with a lid I can operate with one hand and can be opened in the cupboard (if you have room above it for when the lid flips up). You can see how many tea bags I can fit in there. The bamboo is smooth and light weight. The lid isn't real heavy-duty, but if you don't bang it around, it is just fine. I would call this elegant. I love this!
customer_reviews.author: SLP

customer_reviews.title: Looks amazing!
customer_reviews.text: I have a little coffee bar on my desk at work and this is a perfect addition. Looks really nice and it opens very smoothly. No rough edges and nothing is crooked
customer_reviews.author: era3335

customer_reviews.title: I love this.
customer_reviews.text: I love this...I wish I had this along time ago. I purchased this item and the Lipper Divided Bamboo Tea Box. These two go well together and is a great addition to my Tea storage collection.
customer_reviews.author: ChellyChel00

customer_reviews.title: Cute but not very practical
customer_reviews.text: Very cute but the compartments are just a little too small in width for individually-wrapped tea bags, so they don't fit well and end up looking crammed in. This is also not a "space-saver" - it's essentially the same size as the several tea boxes it replaced.
customer_reviews.author: P&P15

customer_reviews.title: great for tea enthusiasts
customer_reviews.text: This is the most convenient tea box. it's very well made, attractive and sleek. It has 5 compartments and each holds much more than I expected. I love that it opens like an old-fashioned bread box! this will definitely be an important mainstay in our household. highly recommend for avid tea drinkers.
customer_reviews.author: Brittney

customer_reviews.title: Nice to see my selection of teas
customer_reviews.text: I use this to display my tea selection in the windowsill of the kitchen window. I find that I'm more apt to reach for green tea if I can see it as readily as I see the coffee pot on the counter, instead of having to move around boxes of tea in the cabinet. So far this has helped and I like the looks of it very much. I would prefer to have it hung on the wall but it still looks nice in the windowsill and I could screw through the wood and hang it if I really decide to do that. Would purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: KLBRN

customer_reviews.title: Teabox Spacesaver
customer_reviews.text: Great teabox holder, was looking for a teabox that was narrow enough for small counter space. Only downside is does not seem to hold larger oversized teabags w/o squishing it in but otherwise highly recommend if looking for a wooden tea box for small spaces.
customer_reviews.author: Tracy Valuso

customer_reviews.title: Great gift, but larger than expected
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a gift for my boss, as he is a big tea drinker and does not like coffee. It is an absolutely great gift and is very beautiful. What I loved about it, is that it has a large acrylic top and door that could be customized if wanted! The only thing I did not like about this, is that it is actually very bulky. Doesn't look like it would be in the photos, but it was a lot larger than I expected. Otherwise, a great gift! I am contemplating purchasing one for my home too.
customer_reviews.author: Jilly P

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Place to Store My Tea
customer_reviews.text: Really like this Lipper tea storage box. Just the right size to hold an assortment of tea bags. What I really like most is the compartments and the clear plastic lid. Having a see thru hard plastic lid makes it easy to see when tea is getting low and time to refill and also the lid is easy to flip up and get tea out of. I put this storage box out on my counter as its a nice quality. Would definately recommend for those that don't want anything oversized. Again this one is just the right in size (about 11x3) and a good quality wood with 5 compartments.
customer_reviews.author: Brina

customer_reviews.title: Practical, lovely price right tea caddy!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased one as a gift for my pastor's wife who hosts our weekly Bible study. She seemed to have several tea boxes in her small counter space. I saw this bamboo tea caddy and it looked like the perfect solution. Once it came I was delighted to see that the quality was great and I especially loved the see-through windows to view the tea. So practical. Very lovely. My pastor's wife loves it as well. And the price was sooo right that I ordered 2 and kept one for me!
customer_reviews.author: Joanne Waliszek

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful tea box!
customer_reviews.text: I love this! The quality is nice and it holds a lot of tea bags. Packaging was great - it took some time to get the box out from how well it was packaged lol I would definitely recommend this product. It does what it’s intended to do with a simple and beautiful design. You can easily place this on your countertop as part of the decor.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very nice, clean and organized looking
customer_reviews.text: These are very nice to organize the tea bags and look so much better than the cardboard boxes. Some bags you do kind of have to put a little sideways but no biggie. I stacked them so I'll have to lift one to get to the ones on the bottom but I knew it would be like that. Good purchase
customer_reviews.author: Amy  B.

customer_reviews.title: It lasted less than. 2 months
customer_reviews.text: When I first got this tea holder I really liked it. It fit nicely on my counter and I liked that the lid was clear so that I could see the assortment of teas. However, after less than 2 months the lid has broken by one of the hinges. I am so disappointed - I am careful with my things so it just be defective.
customer_reviews.author: Tracy M.

customer_reviews.title: Not put together well - cheap
customer_reviews.text: Definitely a get what you pay for, maybe not even that. Fine if it’s for display only, but put together very shoddily. I wouldn’t use it around guests. Clear plastic set too far to one side, leaves a gap between it and the frame on one end, rubs terribly on the other. No way to adjust it. This means it does not close all of the way. And came with a small chip in the plastic. Photos to show all.
customer_reviews.author: Jenie

customer_reviews.title: Gets the job done
customer_reviews.text: It's pretty good. Gets the job done. The spaces are slightly more narrow than the tea bags so they have to be forced in a bit. But they'll get in there. Looks great too. Good value for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Joshua R Kirven

customer_reviews.title: Nice, clean lines BUT...
customer_reviews.text: Really liked the look of this tea storage container...holds about 80 tea packets BUT the cubbies are just a bit small...had to cut the tea bag packaging( NOT the tea bag, just the packaging) to fit facing out. Also, the cover is plastic. It was wrapped really well BUT it was scratched :( Had to be packaged that way :( Returns are so cumbersome, I just accepted it.
customer_reviews.author: Forbes

customer_reviews.title: Meh
customer_reviews.text: 2 of the tea boxes I ordered had scratches and and the plastic part was cracked.. and one of the boxes never showed up. Not a happy customer. Although if you ignore the dings and scratches, the box actually looks nice on my counter top.. it holds a lot and is quite a cute piece.
customer_reviews.author: Kaiberry

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful kitchen addition
customer_reviews.text: Love this tea holder! It does and looks exactly like it should and matches my kitchen perfectly. The only downfall is that there is no hinge on the lid, so if you open it and let go, it drops and slams into the bottom pretty loudly.
customer_reviews.author: Mindy

customer_reviews.title: Love This!
customer_reviews.text: Great tea holder! Excellent quality, and it was packed extremely well to protect it in shipping. It fits on a narrow shelf above my coffee/tea area and holds a LOT of tea! Each section holds about 16 individually wrapped tea bags. The clear lid makes it easy to see what I have in there. It's an attractive piece that looks nice being displayed in my kitchen.
customer_reviews.author: Suzanne

customer_reviews.title: Versatile, sleek and beautiful
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for something that was eye appealing as well as functional and at a fair price. I KNOW that this product met all and exceeded my every expectation. It is made of quality materials, and the design and functionality is great. I would buy this again.
customer_reviews.author: mccool

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I needed!
customer_reviews.text: I bought two and one is verrrrryyyyy squeaky. The size is perfect for kitchen cabinets, it holds the right amount of tea bags and overall I’m happy with the purchase. The squeaking is super annoying, however.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful but you can’t stack them
customer_reviews.text: Daughter loves it and looks great on our counter. You cannot stack them as the lid opens upward. Other wood is beautiful happy we purchased. Bought two so since ai can’t stack them returning 2nd one.
customer_reviews.author: Happy_Tigger

customer_reviews.title: Makes tea options look presentable
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a gift for a co-worker. He keeps the tea box on a shelf by his desk, it's a bit large but if you have the space then it is fine. I am not sure how well it would fit in a cupboard though... I like the sturdiness of the case and the way it opens. It fits quite a lot of tea and they are easy to get at. The ones in the back however seem to get a bit stuck sometimes.
customer_reviews.author: Mike T

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I'm so happy I went with this tea organizer. You can easily fit 100 individually wrapped tea bags in here, and it is so handy to free up some counter space or drawer space. I love being able to see my options and easily pick a tea out. Very well built.
customer_reviews.author: Rhiannon D.

customer_reviews.title: Better than a pile of boxes
customer_reviews.text: Looks beautiful and organized. I put tea in 3, cocoa in 1, and sugar packets in one. Mine had an intense squeak when opening the lid. I resisted the urge to spray it with WD40. Instead I worked some cooking oil in there and it's been fine ever since.
customer_reviews.author: Leslon

customer_reviews.title: Purchased another as house warming gift!
customer_reviews.text: I love this simplistic tea box. It holds quite a large variety and I love that u can see right off what u have without having to dig. It looks clean cut contemporary on the counter!
customer_reviews.author: Hope

customer_reviews.title: Great for all my tea
customer_reviews.text: Perfect box for all my tea Didn’t have to assemble idk why that was an option to review
customer_reviews.author: ValaundraCosplay

customer_reviews.title: This was just ok...
customer_reviews.text: I was not a fan of this product as it was not fit for different size tea bags. The compartments are very tight and the door on this was stiff. This is not for me.
customer_reviews.author: 💜Kiki.L.G💜

customer_reviews.title: Tea time all the time
customer_reviews.text: 4 stars cause the slots are for regular size tea bags some of the tea o but comes in a slightly larger bag and so it doesn’t fit facing forward
customer_reviews.author: Happy jeep girl

customer_reviews.title: Looks great and was the perfect gift.
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my tea loving girlfriend and it's perfect. It separates her different teas that were in a big jar all together and hard to access, plus, it looks really good and is really sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Em Vannoy

customer_reviews.title: Does not fit for Twinings teabags
customer_reviews.text: But with a little scraping on the sides you can make them fit, for regular paper wrapped teabags, this would be a perfect fit. Perfect gift for tea lover in your life.
customer_reviews.author: Teri Starr

customer_reviews.title: ... it was hard to find with various search terms like "tea storage" "counter top tea storage
customer_reviews.text: This is EXACTLY what I was searching for and it was hard to find with various search terms like "tea storage" "counter top tea storage." Anyway, it's the great size and easy to open. When I first opened it, the plastic on one hinge was stuck and chipped but it hasn't affected the usage of the product.
customer_reviews.author: Audrey Grier

customer_reviews.title: Arrived damaged
customer_reviews.text: Hoped the next one won’t be broken, but it arrived cracked and the return/exchange process is a pain when it’s already broken. (UPS is pretty far from our home)
customer_reviews.author: BritM123

customer_reviews.title: Elegant tea holder
customer_reviews.text: This product is great, I use it to hold 5 different types of tea that I drink every morning which makes it super convenient. Looks very nice and elegant. I would rate 5+ stars if it was wood and glass instead of wood and plastic
customer_reviews.author: Michael Zepeda

customer_reviews.title: Attractive, reasonably priced storage solution for tea
customer_reviews.text: I liked the box. As others mentioned, the dividers are just slightly to narrow to fit the tea bag when wrapped in the packages (I was using the Stash brand tea). Otherwise, attractive, easy to access with the hinged lid.
customer_reviews.author: ElizabethB

customer_reviews.title: Does as intended
customer_reviews.text: Used this for a year now and it continues to operate its main function in the same condition I originally received it. A nice way to organize our tea bags and I love the bamboo wood vs other plastic tea storage online.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love the look, just wish it was made a bit better.
customer_reviews.text: I love how this makes my teas so organized crime just wish it was a little sturdier and better made. The window cracked the first day after closing the box. Mostly because it slams shut unless you gently bring the lid down. Also the lid doesn’t close if it’s positioned too much to the right. So I always have to slide it a tad to the left to close it completely.
customer_reviews.author: Kristina Villafane

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product
customer_reviews.text: Product as described and looks just like in the photos shown. Both bamboo and lid pieces have a sturdy weight and feel to them. The lid opens and closes very smoothly. Overall clean look. Excellent organizer for display or to tuck away in a cabinet. Would recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Such a perfect fit! In love with this tea box. Perfectly chic!
customer_reviews.author: Chelsee haines

customer_reviews.title: Does not fit a box of tea.
customer_reviews.text: Does not fit the box so therefire you can't shut the top.Really cute tho.I guess I will have to take them out of the box with no label!
customer_reviews.author: theresa

customer_reviews.title: Nice tea organizer
customer_reviews.text: Nice tea organizer. Got it as a gift for my mother who is a big tea drinker and she really likes it.
customer_reviews.author: GL

customer_reviews.title: Great products, lots of compliments
customer_reviews.text: I get a lot of compliments. It is very easy to access my tea bags. I can fit about 120 bags of tea. The lifting of the lid is very useful. Overall a great product .
customer_reviews.author: Mia

customer_reviews.title: Perfect to Hold my Tea Bags
customer_reviews.text: This looks amazing in my kitchen and I can get rid of the bulky boxes the tea bags originally come in!
customer_reviews.author: NTY

customer_reviews.title: Nice holder
customer_reviews.text: Pretty good tea holder, looks nice in my kitchen filled with tea bags.
customer_reviews.author: Ry Guy

customer_reviews.title: Cute and Functional
customer_reviews.text: We love this box! Our tea bags do seem to fit, albeit snugly, in the slots and fits about one whole box of teabags in each space. We rotate the flavors we have on hand and it's nice to not have to fuss through the cupboard or box for a simple cup of tea. :)
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: The plexi-glass was scrapped some when I got it. The wood is nice and very professional/asthetically pleasing.
customer_reviews.author: The Sullivans

customer_reviews.title: Good!
customer_reviews.text: The cutest tea holder I have found. Great item for tea lovers. Unless you have ALOT of tea then you may want to buy 2 or another product as you can’t fit that much in each slot. The door feels a tiny bit cheap but it’s fine. I Recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Ady

customer_reviews.title: Looks beautiful and neat
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful display box that keeps tea organized as you can see from pictures. Love that I don't have those stupid boxes that never quite closes.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love it, except the small crack
customer_reviews.text: Had a tiny crack, im afraid to open it all the way. Because I dont want it to break all the way.
customer_reviews.author: Natalie orozco

customer_reviews.title: Fragile
customer_reviews.text: It's a nice box, but it arrived with the plastic around the right peg broken. It was wrapped very well-bubble wrap around the box and paper to fill the empty space in the cardboard box. I can use it, but it doesn't open and close well so it's a bit annoying.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: Just what my wife wanted. It is well made and quality materials. Couldn’t ask for more
customer_reviews.author: Randy

customer_reviews.title: Works for me
customer_reviews.text: Just what I wanted. My second time ordering. One for decaf/herbal and one for regular.
customer_reviews.author: KJ

customer_reviews.title: Cheap looking
customer_reviews.text: Arrived with a chip in the plastic and looked cheap.
customer_reviews.author: Laura

customer_reviews.title: Nice box for the price
customer_reviews.text: For this for my mother-in-law, a serious tea drinker. Not a huge box, but perfect to keep her current favorite assortment in easy reach.
customer_reviews.author: Mommy and Daddy

customer_reviews.title: Tazo bags fit perfectly
customer_reviews.text: After asking my fellow shoppers if the Tazo bags would fit...I bought it and they fit perfectly. No manipulation of the packaging was needed. Thank you all for your advice. Couldn't be happier with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Stacy

customer_reviews.title: Nice decoration for tea bag.
customer_reviews.text: Everything looks okay, just lead is not smooth, hard to lift and push down. But the box holds tea bags perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Mona

customer_reviews.title: Love
customer_reviews.text: This is so cute! I’m an avid tea drinker and it really complements my kitchen area
customer_reviews.author: Ivy

customer_reviews.title: A great way to organize
customer_reviews.text: Looks great in my kitchen! Holds a good variety of teas. Also get rid of all the clutter of tea boxes.
customer_reviews.author: Divinity

customer_reviews.title: Had to throw it out
customer_reviews.text: When I opened it, one of the hinges was already broken and a corner or the part part by it was cracked and broken. My kids lost the invoice and package and I couldn’t return it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Like It
customer_reviews.text: Works great, looks nice, fits lots of tea packets in it.
customer_reviews.author: Shakti Ferguson-Hill

customer_reviews.title: Good buy
customer_reviews.text: I bought this fir my sister and she was delighted . It’s not too big and sits comfortably on her counter . Holds enough for her needs .
customer_reviews.author: LES

customer_reviews.title: Great price, Great look
customer_reviews.text: my wife often criticizes my taste in anything decorative, when she saw this she said, "wow, it actually looks good!"
customer_reviews.author: atrou8

customer_reviews.title: it is a nice looking box but did not serve its purpose for ...
customer_reviews.text: It is okay but standard tea bags (still in their individual wrappings) do not fit in the slots. You have to have tea bags without wrappers or, as one reviewer mentioned, you could trim the tea bags. I am not going to trim tea bags though.... I just decided to use it for other things... so... it is a nice looking box but did not serve its purpose for me. :(
customer_reviews.author: S. R.

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!
customer_reviews.text: I loved my tea box! Is bigger than I was expected! Very good quality. The door is made of plastic but still beautiful!
customer_reviews.author: Julia Calvi

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I love It! I’m so happy with it! It’s exactky what I needed to declutter the tons of tea boxes piling up in my shelves.
customer_reviews.author: Scarlett's Mom

customer_reviews.title: Practical & cute
customer_reviews.text: Goes with my decor. holds my teas. Doesn’t take up too much space
customer_reviews.author: Tee

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Tea Storage
customer_reviews.text: The bamboo is beautiful and it looks great out on the counter. I have a large tea assortment and it makes it a lot easier to keep my favorites out, rather than sifting through a dozen boxes.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Kingston

customer_reviews.title: great product
customer_reviews.text: the perfect addition to my coffee bar. durable and beautiful. best purchase
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth Hernandez

customer_reviews.title: Good buy
customer_reviews.text: I love it, the tea bags get stuck here and there but as long as you don’t shove too many in it works
customer_reviews.author: Kindra

customer_reviews.title: Highly reccomend!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love our new tea box! Fits so many and is easy to organize different flavors. Great quality for the price. Not too big for the counter!
customer_reviews.author: T

customer_reviews.title: Love this box!
customer_reviews.text: This box is perfect for storing tea! Each space holds an entire (regular sized) box of tea! It’s very sturdy and pretty to look at when it’s stored in plain sight! I’ve received many compliments on it.
customer_reviews.author: Alondra Suarez

customer_reviews.title: It for a gift
customer_reviews.text: It is for aa gift. I think they will like it . Thanks
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Clean design, good size
customer_reviews.text: Looks great on a counter top, and holds the teabags tightly. Other reviews that mention the wells being too small for tea bags may be correct for larger tea bags, but the standard sized ones I have put in so far have fit perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Extremely pleased. Beautiful teabox organizer!
customer_reviews.text: This is beautiful and I hadn't read the dimensions so it was bigger than I expected. My mom saw it and loved it so I ended up ordering another for myself! Can't find this in stores. Pr9ce excellent and packed with care. Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: Two.to.Tango

customer_reviews.title: Great Storage
customer_reviews.text: Hold 15-20 packages of tea per space, looks really nice and fancy. Love it, I can see all my tea selection in here.
customer_reviews.author: CMA

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I was looking for
customer_reviews.text: I have an overabundance of tea laying around and this is the perfect holder for it. It is really cute and does the job perfectly. I would recommend buying this for yourself or as a gift. I will be buying another for a tea-loving friend.
customer_reviews.author: Harley

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money
customer_reviews.text: I love this! It wasn't exactly what i was looking for to hold my tea but I'm so glad i came across this product. It looks perfect on my coffee bar. Not to big either. The bread box style is classic and stylish!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Perfect size for a house tea storage. I wish they would do it in charcoal or black, even dark chocolate.
customer_reviews.author: emdoring

customer_reviews.title: Good purchase
customer_reviews.text: This little teabag holder is attractive and well made. The divisions need to be about 1/4” wider because the teabags are rather snug. I’m using Twinings.
customer_reviews.author: NANCY T

customer_reviews.title: Beutiful tea holder
customer_reviews.text: I was looking where to put all my tea, and this is just rigth, beautiful and useful
customer_reviews.author: Edwin Laydera

customer_reviews.title: Cheap
customer_reviews.text: Cheaply made. The lid won’t stay down. Feels like you’re going to break it every time you open it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: A must have for all my tea lovers!
customer_reviews.text: Arrived super quick. It was packaged very nicely. Perfect addition to my kitchen and it fit all of my tea bags, it displays them perfectly. Would totally recommend to all my tea lovers.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy Garcia

customer_reviews.title: Cute!
customer_reviews.text: Charming and well made. Looks great sitting on my countertop. I have received many compliments. Would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This item hold more teabags than you would expect.
customer_reviews.text: There is absolutely nothing I dislike about this item. Looks great and I can actually fit one box of tea 20 bags in each compartment! No more cabinet cluttered with boxes. Totally serves the purpose for me. Love it
customer_reviews.author: R. Anderson

customer_reviews.title: I like the way it looks
customer_reviews.text: I love this tea holder. All the teas fit perfectly. It is pretty.
customer_reviews.author: penny

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: tea bags r different sizes and it doesn't work with all
customer_reviews.author: craig tedesco

customer_reviews.title: No
customer_reviews.text: Arrived with a crack in the front. Looks and feels cheap
customer_reviews.author: JM

customer_reviews.title: Happy with my purchase
customer_reviews.text: So much more exciting to grab my tea bag out of this cute box!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy construction
customer_reviews.text: Organizes the tea, makes it easy to access. Very attractive
customer_reviews.author: Gmrgrm

customer_reviews.title: Great gift for any tea lover!
customer_reviews.text: Love this. It has cut down on all the random boxes we had laying around.
customer_reviews.author: Kat H.

customer_reviews.title: Good design
customer_reviews.text: Acrylic top/front section rotates up so you can access teabags from the front or top - you can mix up types of tea in a row and easily get at them. Looks pretty and is well made.
customer_reviews.author: al tishal otiTop Contributor: Camping

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: Pretty, easy to clean, keeps tea selections in order. I loved it!
customer_reviews.author: Megan

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for keeping on the counter to keep my extensive ...
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for keeping on the counter to keep my extensive tea collection organized. Fits several boxes of tea - basically a whole box fits in each compartment.
customer_reviews.author: Holly

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: It is a perfect fit for my cubicle at work! Holds all the tea I've got and then some. It's a great value for the price!
customer_reviews.author: Randy Buckley Jr

customer_reviews.title: but looks nice on the counter and does exactly what I hoped ...
customer_reviews.text: A little larger than I expected, but looks nice on the counter and does exactly what I hoped it would.
customer_reviews.author: Whitney

customer_reviews.title: Broken
customer_reviews.text: Ordered 2 of these. The first one was perfect and looks amazing. The second one came cracked and was a bummer when opening!
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Advocate

customer_reviews.title: Perfect tea storage/display
customer_reviews.text: I didnt have any problems with the product. all my tea bags fit and it looks very nice and organized
customer_reviews.author: caroline

customer_reviews.title: I'm the perfect tea box
customer_reviews.text: Love this tea box. It's perfect and holds all of my teas. Great quality for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Shell

customer_reviews.title: A perfect tea box
customer_reviews.text: A perfect tea box for my family since we all like different teas and I was looking for a box that can accommodate at least four different flavors and look nice and cool.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love It!
customer_reviews.text: I Love this tea caddy and it fits perfectly on my counter.
customer_reviews.author: S. Perry

product_meta.title: Lipper International 8187 Bamboo Wood and Acrylic Tea Box with 5 Sections, 14" x 5" x 3-3/4"
product_meta.description: Style Name:5-Section with Acrylic CoverLipper International provides exceptionally valued items for the kitchen, home, office, and child's playroom. Known for their functionality and beauty, each of our products is individually crafted from the finest quality materials. Organize and display your tea in this beautifully made bamboo wood and acrylic tea box. Made of bamboo wood, it makes a great housewarming gift. Hand wash only.
feature_bullets: Elegant way to organize and store your tea, can also be used as a keepsake or jewelry box
